title: The most spoken languages worldwide
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Native speaker in millions for 10 number of Languagess.
The Native speaker in millions is appeared to be the highest at Languages Chinese and lowest at Languages Lahnda.
There is a difference of 1192.0 between the maximum Languages Chinese and minimum Languages Lahnda.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Languages, and Native speaker in millions in each Languages on the y axis.
Languages Chinese has the highest Native speaker in millions and Lahnda has the lowest Native speaker in millions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Native speaker in millions for 10 number of Languagess.
The Native speaker in millions is appeared to be the highest at Languages Chinese and lowest at Languages Lahnda.
There is a difference of 1192.0 between the maximum Languages Chinese and minimum Languages Lahnda.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Languages in the x axis and Native speaker in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Native speaker in millions 1311.0 is found at Languages Chinese and the minimum is found at Lahnda where Languages is 119.0.
Languages Spanish has the second highest value for Native speaker in millions.
The Native speaker in millions of Languages Chinese is 11.02% larger than the minimum value at Lahnda.
Native speaker in millions at Languages Chinese is 1311.0 , second place is Spanish at 460.0, and thirdly is English at 379.0.
The Languages Lahnda tends to be 3.58 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Languagess, we get total 3660.0.
